I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.talks

go.talks: changes to "code that grows with grace"

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6774048

LGTM
.... having just watched this evolution in two showings.
